      Saves imported markingLayers from copied ImageLayer to originalImageLayer.

      Adds markings from XML-file to wanted ImageLayer

      Adds MouseListener to given JButton.
      private void cancelSelected()
      Hides window.
      private void continueCreatingImageLayers()
      When closing the window this method sets window invisible and adds newly created ImageLayers to list of ImageLayers.
      private void continueUpdatingImageLayers()
      When closing the window this method sets window invisible and updates modified ImageLayers to list of ImageLayers.

      Creates ImageAndMarkingPanel from given ImageLayer and it's MarkingLayers.

      Removes MarkingLayer from ImageLayer that is is in list of AddImageLayerDialog-object.

    • Method Detail

      • addImagesToImageLayerList

        private void addImagesToImageLayerList(java.io.File[] imageFiles)
        Creates ImageLayer objects to imageLayerList by inserting paths of parameter file(s). If path is already used in an imageLayer object, no new ImageLayer is created.
        Parameters:
        imageFiles - List of files, which path are used in creating ImageLayer objects

      • addKeyListenerToButton

        private javax.swing.JButton addKeyListenerToButton(javax.swing.JButton button)
        Adds a KeyListener to a given JButton.
        Parameters:
        button - JButton where to add action
        Returns:
        JButton where added action

      • addMarkingLayerIfNotExists

        private boolean addMarkingLayerIfNotExists(ImageLayer originalIL,
                                 ImageLayer copyIL)
        Saves imported markingLayers from copied ImageLayer to originalImageLayer. Before saving removes MarkingLayer with same name if found.
        Parameters:
        originalIL - @see ImageLayer the original ImageLayer, which is in list of present ImageLayers (shown in LAYERS-panel in GUI).
        copyIL - @see ImageLayer the copyed Imagelayer where imported MarkingLayers are added in import part.
        Returns:
        boolean true if saved MarkingLayer to ImageLayer, otherwise false.

      • addMarkingsToSelectedImageLayer

        private void addMarkingsToSelectedImageLayer(java.io.File xmlFile,
                                   java.lang.String imageLayerPath)
        Adds markings from XML-file to wanted ImageLayer
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - External file containing markings for selected imageLayer
        imageLayerPath - The absolute filepath of selected ImageLayer

      • isImageFile

        private boolean isImageFile(java.io.File file)
        Checks is the given file proper image file (supported images : tiff, jpg, png...) and is the image size same as already imported images. ONLY IMAGES WITH SAME PIXEL SIZE ARE ALLOWED TO OPEN!
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be checked
        Returns:
        boolean value is file proper image file

      • isImportingAllowedImageDimension

        private boolean isImportingAllowedImageDimension(java.io.File file)
        Determines the dimension of given image file and compares it to present used dimension of images. If there is no present dimension is new dimension saved using dimension of given image and true returned. If there is present dimension and dimension of given image is same -> true; otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        file - @see File a image file which dimension is determined
        Returns:
        boolean true if dimension of given image file is accepted otherwise false

      • makeCopyOfList

        private java.util.ArrayList<ImageLayer> makeCopyOfList(java.util.ArrayList<ImageLayer> iLayer)
        Gets a list ImageLayers and creates a full copy of all of them (not references to objects).
        Parameters:
        iLayer - @see ArrayList of ImageLayers
        Returns:
        @see ArrayList of ImageLayers

      • selectAndAddImages

        private void selectAndAddImages()
        Opens a file dialog, which type depends on which file type will be opened.

      • selectAndAddMarkings

        private void selectAndAddMarkings(java.lang.String imageLayerPath,
                        boolean isMarkingsForAll)
        Opens window where user can open xml-file for importing MarkingLayers to given ImageLayer or for all ImageLayers in list of AddImageLayersDialog-object.
        Parameters:
        imageLayerPath - Path for selected imageLayer or first ImageLayer of list
        isMarkingsForAll - Boolean should add MarkingLayers to all ImageLayers if found any.

      • setImportAllowedImageDimension

        public void setImportAllowedImageDimension(java.awt.Dimension importAllowedImageDimension)
        Sets the allowed ImageDimension = present dimension of image(s) in main GUI.
        Parameters:
        importAllowedImageDimension - @see Dimension allowed dimension

      • setPanelPosition

        public void setPanelPosition()
        Sets the panel position and child dialogs when user drags the main window. This is only happening in Linux. In other OS the dragging is not possible, because modal dialogs are used.

      • setPresentFolder

        public void setPresentFolder(java.lang.String folder)
        Sets the folder that is previously used.
        Parameters:
        folder - String path of used folder

      • showDialog

        public void showDialog()
        Sets dialog visible.

      • showMessage

        private void showMessage(java.lang.String title,
               java.lang.String message)
        Opens message dialog with ok-button.
        Parameters:
        title - String title of message
        message - String message

      • updateImageList

        private void updateImageList()
        Refreshes the imageLayerList by going throw array of ImageLayers (+ MarkingLayer) -> creating JPanels and adding them on imageScrollPanel (IMAGE LIST)
